text: Saturday, Sunday and Friday, originally titled Sabato, domenica e venerd√¨, is a 1979 Italian Spanish comedy movie directed by Castellano & Pipolo, Pasquale Festa Campanile and Sergio Martino. It stars Manuel Gallardo, Edwige Fenech, Lino Banfi, Lova Moor, Adriano Celentano, Barbara Bouchet, Salvatore Baccaro. ==Other websites== * Category:1979 comedy movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Spanish comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Sergio Martino Category:Movies directed by Castellano & Pipolo Category:Movies directed by Pasquale Festa Campanile
title: Saturday, Sunday and Friday
